729361f-a.text:
664 Richmond Road, adjoining the S.E. corner of St. Patricks Place, showing the Richmond Engine Company No. 1, a volunteer organization. The view is eastward from
St. Patricks Place.
JJune 13, 1927
P. L. Sperr

729362f-a.text:
672 Richmond Road, at the S. E. corner of St. Patricks Place. Shown is the rear of the house at the above address, seen from Center Street Tright)and St. Pstricks Place. It was ovned by D. L. Stevens in 1874 and by the Prier far.ily from 1898 to 1917. Dates refer to maps on which the owners'
hnames appear.
Nay 6, 1936
P. L. Sperr
